name: Firefox Bookmark Toolbar and Sidebar Tweaks
description:
For Firefox versions 3.x and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

This is my personal use Bookmark Toolbar and Sidebar userstyle for Firefox. This userstyle allows you to replace folder icons on the Bookmarks Toolbar with ones of your own and shows bookmarks text on hover, Hides useless Toolbar buttons drop-markers on the Bookmarks Toolbar, and the Bookmarks Sidebar contents are moved to the Left-Edge of window.

Tested on Firefox versions 3.x and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

***!Important!*** - Read this article: 
http://forums.wincustomize.com/308561 to learn how to replace folder icons on the Bookmarks Toolbar with icons(16X16) of your own using this userstyle.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
additional_info:
Updated 03-08-2013
Added more custom Bookmark Toolbar folder icons for some RSS feed folders.

Updated 03-31-2012
Included the updated code for Fx 14.0a1 from style:
style 60114

Updated 03-20-2012
Due to Bug 693510 - drop support for prefixes from border-radius* and box-shadow 

Updated 01-29-2012
Restored [Ext]Firefm old status-bar icon buttons borders, also removed style style 15061 code, now only redundant toolbar button drop-markers are hidden by default.

Updated 11-10-2011
Adjusted the position of bookmarked sites in the Bookmarks Sidebar to be nearer the Left-Edge of window.

Updated 02-07-2011
Bookmark Item Text on Hover now more visible when using moderately dark themes.

Updated 12-30-2010
Now compatible with [Ext]UI Fixer:
https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/firefox-4-ui-fixer

Modified code from Userstyles:

Article: http://forums.wincustomize.com/308561 to learn how to replace folder icons on the Bookmarks Toolbar with icons(16X16) of your own using this userstyle.
